extensionDescription.message: A browser extension designed for language enthusiasts, providing romanization for non-Latin scripts.

btnRomanize.description: Button label to convert page text to romanization

btnRestore.description: Button label to restore page to original state

tabScripts.description: Tab title to display supported language scripts

tabSettings.description: Tab title to display extension settings

tabInstruction.description: Tab title to display user guide

toastCompleteTitle.description: Notification title when conversion is complete

toastCompleteDesc.description: Notification description when conversion is complete

toastCompleteWarn.message: Romanization results are for reference only.

toastUnfoundTitle.description: Notification title when no convertible text is found

toastUnfoundDesc.message: Please select appropriate language and script type
toastUnfoundDesc.description: Notification description when no convertible text is found

toastRestoredTitle.description: Notification title when page restoration is complete

toastRestoredDesc.message: Page has been restored to its original state
toastRestoredDesc.description: Notification description when page restoration is complete

toastErrorConvTitle.description: Error notification title when conversion fails

toastErrorConvDesc.message: Page conversion failed, please refresh and try again
toastErrorConvDesc.description: Error notification description when conversion fails

toastErrorRestoreTitle.description: Error notification title when restoration fails

toastErrorRestoreDesc.message: Page restoration failed, please refresh and try again
toastErrorRestoreDesc.description: Error notification description when restoration fails

setUILangDesc.message: You can switch the UI language.

setUILangReset.description: Button label to reset all options to default state
